content:
User: Missing Context Clarity: It’s looking for the transcript in the wrong place (e.g., chat history or web searches) because it doesn’t recognize the provided chunk as the target.

Grok: Overcomplicating: Instead of sticking to the task—tagging 16 [JESSE PROMPT] and 16 [GROK RESPONSE] sections—it’s spiraling into irrelevant tangents like parsing tools and web searches.
